about_description: Providing quality machine solutions and export services for batching plants, construction, stone crushers, and others. We are committed to meeting your industrial needs. More than 50+ companies have trusted PumaCon. PumaCon has been around and starting professional projects for more than 20 years. PumaCon has been established in the field of Concrete Batching Plant and Construction Machinery.
services_description: PumaCon provides Export Service for Batching Plants, Construction Machinery, and Spare Parts for Batching Plants as well as services for making Stone Crushers, Weigh Bridges, Sieve Machines, Cement Transfers, Hoppers, Silos, Conveyors, and various other Industrial Needs.
vision_description: To be a leading company in the provision of industrial machinery solutions and export services, especially in the field of batching plants and construction, which is trusted in national and international markets.
mission_1: 1. Provide high quality industrial machinery products and services that meet customer needs.
mission_2: 2. Maintain a commitment to professionalism and integrity in every project and business relationship.
mission_3: 3. Continue to innovate in the development of technology and systems to support the efficiency of the construction industry.
mission_4: 4. Provide reliable and timely export services to various destination countries.
mission_5: 5. Build long-term relationships with customers through satisfaction and trust.
mission_6: 6. Contribute to the growth of Indonesia's manufacturing and construction industry through quality and perseverance.
